name: Rameshwar Metal
overview:
Established in the year, 2007, we “Rameshwar Metal” are engaged in manufacturing, supplying an array of Cabinet Handle, Cabinet Pull Handle, Cabinet Designer Handle, Cloth Hook, Hardware Fitting and Bathroom Accessories. Our product range includes Fancy Cabinet Handle, Stylish Cabinet Handle, Modular Cabinet Handle and Cabinet Handle.

Our Team: Quality inspectors Marketing & sales professionals Warehousing & packing professionals Research associates Skilled & non-skilled labours Administrative professionals

Quality: We are one of the reputed organizations which follow strict quality control policy in every sphere of our business process. The quality checking is done in each stage of the products which includes from procuring raw material to the final stage of delivery.

Infrastructure: We are supported by a sprawling infrastructure which is divided into various segments for a hassle-free working process. The various departments are manufacturing, quality assurance, research & development, warehousing & packing, marketing & sales, administrative and logistic.

Client Satisfaction: Customers widely known a business clients play a vital role in the profit making of any company. Therefore, we immensely take care of the customers by offering a defect-free range of Cabinet Handle, Cabinet Pull Handle, Cabinet Designer Handle, Cloth Hook, Hardware Fitting and Bathroom Accessories.

Why Us?: Constantly effort to improve the functional efficiency of the products Continuous improvement of work processes to achieve maximum customer satisfaction Capitalize on skilled & experienced manpower Pool of efficient engineers adept with the latest technologies Empowered with strong market network
